title: Google\Cloud\Dataproc\V1\SubmitJobRequest
name: SubmitJobRequest
description:
A request to submit a job.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dataproc.v1.SubmitJobRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.project_id
params.description: Required. The ID of the Google Cloud Platform project that the job belongs to.

params.name: data.region
params.description: Required. The Dataproc region in which to handle the request.

params.name: data.request_id
params.description: Optional. A unique id used to identify the request. If the server receives two SubmitJobRequests with the same id, then the second request will be ignored and the first [Job][google.cloud.dataproc.v1.Job] created and stored in the backend is returned. It is recommended to always set this value to a UUID. The id must contain only letters (a-z, A-Z), numbers (0-9), underscores (_), and hyphens (-). The maximum length is 40 characters.

methods.name: getRequestId
methods.description:
Optional. A unique id used to identify the request. If the server receives two SubmitJobRequests with the same id, then the second request will be ignored and the first [Job][google.cloud.dataproc.v1.Job] created and stored in the backend is returned.

It is recommended to always set this value to a UUID. The id must contain only letters (a-z, A-Z), numbers (0-9), underscores (_), and hyphens (-). The maximum length is 40 characters.
